0.Major_Activities1: Aims at eliminating the waste produced from single-use, throwaway PP and paper carry bags by firstly, informing and persuading residents to refuse carry bags, instead bring their own bags and secondly, recovering the leftover fabrics from local tailors to make reusable shopping bags as a sustainable alternative to single-use carry bags
